amendment.description: To make a technical correction to title 38, United States Code.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5034 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5034 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Craig. (consideration: CR S10006; text: CR S10006) To make a technical correction to title 38, United States Code.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5034 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Craig.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5034 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
